steps.title: Prepare the BBQ Tri Tip
instructions: Rub the tri tip with a mixture of salt, black pepper, garlic powder, and smoked paprika.
Sear the tri tip on all sides over high heat on a grill, then reduce heat to medium and cook until desired doneness.

steps.title: Make BBQ Pulled Pork
instructions: Season the pork shoulder with a BBQ spice mix and place it in a slow cooker.
Add apple cider vinegar and BBQ sauce, then cook on low for 8 hours until tender. Shred with forks.

steps.title: Cook Mac and Cheese
instructions: Cook elbow macaroni according to package instructions, drain.
In a saucepan, melt butter and stir in flour to create a roux. Gradually add milk, stirring until thickened. Mix in grated cheddar and mix with macaroni.

steps.title: Roast Vegetables
instructions: Chop broccoli into florets, toss with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Roast in a preheated oven at 400°F (200°C) until edges are crispy and browned.
